codelist.title: MARC Code List for Geographic Areas

note.text: Coded [nwxi] (Saint Kitts and Nevis) before Mar. 1988
Includes the Czech Republic and Slovakia treated collectively

note.text: For Germany as a whole regardless of time period; includes Germany (East) and Germany (West) as a whole between 1949 and 1990]
Coded [e-gx] (Germany) for Berlin as a whole; [e-ge] (Germany (East)) for East Berlin; or [e-gw] (Germany (West)) for West Berlin before Jan. 1991]
For the eastern part of Germany before 1949 or after 1990 and for the German Democratic Republic between 1949-1990]
For the western part of Germany before 1949 or after 1990 and for the Federal Republic of Germany between 1949-1990
